ValidationRule.description: A Workers Comp Commission cannot be >= 11% for a Renewal
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits") &&
AND( Coverages__c = "Workers Compensation", ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c, "Renewal"), NOT( Marketer_UW__c = "INSUREtrust"), (Commission_Rate__c >= 0.11), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Approved/Closed Won") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Commission Rate: WC Renewal Commission rate must be less than 11%
